verses.content: “Riminhnik rawna dingin mâichâm siem i ta, shittim thingin siem i tih.
A seitieng tawng khat, a lientieng tawng khat, killi nei nîng a tih. Ân sângtieng chu tawng hni nîng a ta, chutaka a kihai chu ama le zawm- khat an ni ding a nih.
A chung le a sîrhai, a vêlin, a kihai leh rângkachak inluonkhum i ta; chun, a vêlin rângkachak rei siem bawk i tih.
A kalhai pahni chung a rei hnuoia chun rângkachak kuol pahni siem la, a sîr hniah i siem ding a nih: chu chu a zâwnnaa zâwnfunghai rawlna ding nîng a tih.
Shittim thing zâwnfunghai siem i ta, rângkachakin inluonkhum i tih.
Thuthlung bâwm chunga zângai- na ṭhungpha kân tuokpuina ding che hma zâwnah, Thuthlung bâwm kâwl- a puonzâr hmaa chun sieng i tih.
Chun, Aronin chu chunga chun thil riminhnik chu râwng a ta, zîng tinin khâwnvarhai chu a chei pha raw hlak a tih.
Aron chun zântienga khâwnvar- hai ân sit pha chun raw bawk a tih; in thlahai chenin LALPA hmaah rimin- hnik chu raw zing in tih.
Chu chunga chun riminhniklo thil, pumrawhmang thilinhlân khawm, fâkmi thilinhlân khawm în hlân ding a ni nawh a, dâwnmi thilinhlân hrim a chunga chun i bur ding a ni bawk nawh.

Aron chun a kihai chunga chun kum khata vawi khat intlanna siem a ta; in thlahai chenin intlanna suol ta dinga thilinhlân thisen chun kum khatah vawikhat mâichâm ta dinga intlanna siempêk a tih, LALPA kuoma inthiengtak a nih,” tiin.
LALPA chun Mosie kuomah a hril a,
“Israel thlahai nizât i tiem pha chun, tiem an ninaa an nizât ang peiin, mi tinin ama ta dingin intlanna sum pêk ding a nih, anni i tiem pha anni laia hri a um nawna dingin.
Intiemnaa tiema um taphawt chun pêng a tih: Hmun Inthieng sum dingin shekel chenve (shekel khat chu gerah sâwmhni a nih), LALPA kuoma thilinhlân dingin shekel chenve bawk pêng a tih.
Mi tin intiemnaa ṭhang phâk, kum sâwmhniha upa le a chung- tienghai chun LALPA thilinhlân a pêk ding a nih.
In hringna ta dinga intlanna siem dinga LALPA kuoma thilinhlân in pêk pha chun hausa khawmin shekel chenve nêka tam pe naw nih a, pasie khawma chu nêka tlâwm chu a pêk ding a ni nawh.

Israel thlahai kuoma inthawkin intlanna sum chu lâng i ta, intuokna puon in rawngbâwlna dingin hmang i tih; in hringna ta dinga intlanna siem dinga LALPA hmaha Israel thlahai ta dinga hriet zingna a ni theina dingin,” tiin.
LALPA chun Mosie kuoma chun a hril a,
“Insâwpna dingin, dâr maihûn, a ṭhut khawm dârin i siem bawk ding a nih. Mâichâm le intuokna puon in inkâra chun sieng i ta, a sûnga chun tui sie bawk i tih.
Aron le a naupasalhai chun chutaka chun an kuthai an kehai sâwp an tih.
Intuokna puon ina an lût ding phain amanih, LALPA kuoma meia thil inhlân raw dinga mâichâm hnaia rawngbâwl dinga an hung phain, tuia chun an insâwp ding a nih, an thi nawna dingin.
An kuthai, an kehai sâwp an tih.; chuongchun, thi naw ni hai; chun, anni ta dingin kumkhuoha dân nîng a tih, ama le a chithla le an thlahai chen khawmin,” tiin.
Chu naw khawm chu LALPAIN Mosie kuoma chun a hril a,
“Riminhnik pui deu deuhai la la, murra tui inthieng shekel za nga bûk, thingzungthak riminhnik chu zâtve, chu chu shekel za hni sâwmnga, mafu riminhnik shekel za hni sâwmnga,
thingzungthak chi dang shekel za nga bûk; hieng hi Hmun Inthieng- a shekel bûk hmang dân ang peiin nîng a ta; chun, oliv hriek hin khat leh;
hienghai hi chawkpawlin innâl- na hriek inthieng, rim inhniktak, riminhnik siemtu siem dân angtakin siem i ta, chu chu innâlna hriek inthieng nîng a tih.
Chu hriek chun intuokna puon in le Thuthlung bâwm,
dawkân le a hmangruo po po, khâwnvar siena le a hmangruo dang po po le riminhnik rawna mâichâm le,
pumrawhmang thilinhlânna mâichâm le a hmangruo po po le, dâr maihûn le ân ṭhutna le chun nâl i tih.
Chun, inthiengtak an ni theina dingin inhlân i ta, chu chu tâwk taphawt chu inthieng an tih.
Chun, Aron le a naupasalhai chu thiempu sina ka hmaha rawng an bâwl theina dingin nâl i ta, inhlân bawk i tih.
Israel thlahai kuoma chun hril la, ‘Hi hi in thlahai chenin ka kuoma innâlna hriek inthieng nîng a tih.
Mi narân taksa chunga hrim hrim buok a ni ding a ni nawh a, hi chawkpawl angtak hin, ama ang hi in siem ding a ni nawh: inthieng a nih a, in ta ding khawmin inthieng a ni ding a nih.
Tukhawm ama angtaka lo chawkpawl amanih, mi narân chunga lo nâl amanih, an um chun, ama chu a mihai laia inthawka sâtthlâk nîng a tih,’ tiin,” a tih a.
Chun, LALPA chun Mosie kuomah, “Hieng riminhnikhai, stak- te le onikha le galbanam la la; hieng riminhnikhai hi rimtui in- thieng leh bûk intluk seng an ni ding a nih.
Riminhnik siemtu siem dân angtakin, riminhnik rawmi, rimin- hniktakin, chiha saw, inthieng le faitakin siem i tih.
A hlek chite vaw thla hlak i ta, kân tuokpuina ding che intuokna puon ina Thuthlung bâwm hmaa chun sieng i ta, i ta dinga inthiengtak a ni ding a nih.
Hieng chawkpawl dân anga riminhnik i siem chu nanga ta dingin i siem ding a ni nawh a: i ta ding chun LALPA ta dinga inthieng a ni ding a nih.
Mi tukhawm mâni hmang dinga chuong anga rim nei siemtu chu a mihai laia inthawka sât thlâk nîng a tih,” tiin.
